H0.text: What was the name of the computer in Stanley Kubricks 2001: A Space Odyssey. OMNI

H1.text: What was the name of the computer in Stanley Kubricks 2001: A Space Odyssey. MOTHER

H2.text: What was the name of the computer in Stanley Kubricks 2001: A Space Odyssey. SPECTRA

H3.text: What was the name of the computer in Stanley Kubricks 2001: A Space Odyssey. HAL

A4.text: HAL 9000 (or simply HAL or Hal) is a fictional artificial intelligence character and the main antagonist in the Space Odyssey series.

A5.text: HAL's name, according to Clarke, is derived from Heuristically programmed ALgorithmic computer.
